name: Multihex demo
description:
Full version will be available soon, but pre-registrations are open on the Google Play Store.

Multihex is a minimalistic puzzle game which plays according to three basic steps:
• Fill the grid by placing a few cells
• The placed cells will then spread over the grid by themselves
• The puzzle is solved when a certain color ratio is reached!

Cells follow rules while spreading. Some spread only in certain directions, while other wait for a bit before they spread. When two cells want to spread to the same spot, the color determines which one gets it.

Demo Features:
• 9 unique puzzles
• Minimalistic design
• Relaxing soundtrack
• Colorblind support
• Simple controls
